content.rendered:
Daily, Weekly & Monthly Current Affairs for UPSC IAS Prelims-Mains Exams

UPSC Current Affairs

Before Preparing for UPSC IAS exams, it is important to be familiar with the current issue, so that you can pass the current affairs section and land in your dream government job. UPSC Board is going to conduct an examination and if you are preparing for this exam then go through the Daily, Weekly & Monthly Current Affairs for UPSC IAS Exams & also UPSC Previous Year questions. With the help of our current affairs section, you can have a detailed idea about current affairs happening around you – state, national, international, sports & other events.

If you are in search of the best site for current affairs PDF download, Chennai IAS Academy provides you Monthly UPSC Current Affairs Download PDF  Files and easily understandable way. Apart from the current affairs, you may also learn about the general information related to those current affairs from this site.

S.NoUPSC Monthly Current Affairs TitlesEnglish Medium
1UPSC Current Affairs October Month part I, 2018Download PDF
2UPSC Current Affairs October Month part II, 2018Download PDF
3UPSC Current Affairs November Month Part I, 2018Download PDF
4UPSC Current Affairs November Month Part II, 2018Download PDF
5UPSC Current Affairs December Month Part I, 2018Download PDF
6UPSC Current Affairs December Month Part II, 2018Download PDF
